title: Max Verstappen wins F1’s Italian Grand Prix with dominant drive at Monza – live
summary: Tom Bassam provides live updates for the Italian Grand Prix at Monza. Follow along for lap-by-lap coverage of the race. Stay tuned for the latest developments as the event unfolds.

title: England set South Africa target of 415 to win third men’s one-day international – live
summary: South Africa has won the three-match ODI series against England. The final match will take place at the Utilita Bowl. England aims to salvage some pride in the upcoming game.

title: UK’s new business secretary Peter Kyle to visit Beijing in first week
summary: The UK government has promoted a former science and technology secretary in a cabinet reshuffle. This move aims to bolster efforts to enhance trade relations with China. The promotion reflects a renewed focus on improving economic ties with the country.

title: Liverpool 1-4 Everton, Manchester United 4-0 Leicester, Spurs 1-0 West Ham: WSL – as it happened
summary: Ornella Vignola led Everton to a 4-1 victory at Anfield, scoring a hat-trick in their season opener. Meanwhile, Manchester United and Tottenham also secured wins in their first matches. The strong starts highlight a competitive opening weekend in the league.

title: Chineke! Orchestra/Heyward review – kaleidoscopic concert combines energy and complexity
summary: An ethnically diverse orchestra performed energetically, showcasing a vibrant program featuring works by Samuel Coleridge-Taylor, Shostakovich, and Valerie Coleman. The performance highlighted the richness of diverse musical backgrounds. Their spirited interpretation resonated with the audience.
